DOC.brief_summary: The present study aim investigate whether daily intake lupin protein neuromuscular electrical stimulation training twice day improve local glucose uptake m. soleus 60 day unload phase special unloading device , HEPHAISTOS orthosis ( HEP ) .
DOC.brief_title: Unloading Induced Effects Local Glucose Uptake Into m. Soleus
DOC.detailed_description: The 60 day unload intervention HEPHAISTOS unloading device follow key objective : primary hypothesis : - Assesment evaluation insulin sensitivity local glucose uptake unload m. soleus whether improved dietary supplementation lupin seed neuromuscular electrical stimulation . secondary hypothesis : - Assesment evaluation unloading-induced reduction muscle mass whether mitigate dietary supplementation lupin seed neuromuscular electrical stimulation . - Assesment evaluation whole-body glycemic effect intervention .
DOC.criteria: Male volunteer Age : 20 45 year Body mass index ( BMI ) : 20 26 kg/m2 Agreement sign consent study Smoker Competitive Athletes Diabetes mellitus Rheumatic disease Muscle joint disease Bone fracture period one year study start Herniated disc Flatfeet ( pe planus ) Allergy nut legume Vascular disease Epilepsy Severe hyperlipidemia Anemia ( < Hb standard value ; standard value healthy men : 13.5 17.5 g/dl ) * Increased thrombosis risk * Kidney disorder : deviation normal value creatinine plasma . ( Normal value : Creatinine < 1.20 mg/dl ) * Lesions cruciate ligament , orthopedic surgery past 10 year side Hephaistos orthosis Achilles tendon injury , rupture past 10 year side orthosis hyper/hypocalcaemia ( abnormal level calcium blood , normal level : 2.15 2.64 mmol/l ) Intake antiinflammatory drug study Abuse drug alcohol ( > 2030g alcohol/day ) Participation another clinical study within last 2 month start study Increased bleeding tendency ( hemophilia , regular use anticoagulant ) History intolerance local anesthetic Imprisoned study Any condition class unsuitable study participation medical executive director prior conviction ( objectionable criminal record ) Additional Exclusion Criteria MRI Metal implant osteosynthesis material Pacemaker Claustrophobia
